Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/rage/descr: Unleash your fury, causing all attacks to do guaranteed critical lethal damage.
Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/protection: The priestess protects you, providing a magical barrier that absorbs the next 2 hits.
Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/silence/de: You hear nothing but silence. The next dungeon floor will have no monsters.
Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/fortune/de: Fortune favors the bold. Traverse the ladder to the next dungeon floor.
Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/redemption: The priestess blesses you, providing you with a second chance at life.
Items/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/concealmen: Your body becomes ethereal, allowing you to remain undetected by monsters.
Notifications/Mods/Faux Sigils/sigil_res: Faux Sigils may only be used in the dungeon!
Notifications/Mods/Faux Sigils/Sigils/co: Your concealment fades! Monsters will now detect you.
